text: nirākarikkum peṇkaḷukku, nūh napiyiṉuṭaiya maṉaiviyaiyum, lūt napiyiṉuṭaiya maṉaiviyaiyum allāh utāraṇamākki vaikkiṟāṉ. Ivviru peṇkaḷum, nam aṭiyārkaḷil iru nallaṭiyārkaḷiṉ maṉaivikaḷākavē iruntaṉar. Eṉiṉum, ivviru peṇkaḷum taṅkaḷ kaṇavaṉmārkaḷukkut turōkam ceytaṉar. (Ākavē, ivarkaḷ iruvarum napimārkaḷiṉ maṉaivikaḷāyiruntum) allāhvuṭaiya vētaṉaiyiliruntu etaiyum taṭuttukkoḷḷa muṭiyavillai. (Ivarkaḷ turōkam ceytataṉ kāraṇamāka ivarkaḷai nōkki) ‘‘narakattil pukupavarkaḷuṭaṉ nīṅkaḷ iruvarum pukuntu viṭuṅkaḷ'' eṉṟē kūṟappaṭṭatu
